about_the_game:
Game Description

"Shadow Prisoner" is a 2D fighting game with simple controls that allows you to perform exhilarating combos.

You can play with 25 characters (9 characters will be added for free, and one character is a collaboration character that will be paid DLC).

Even if you are new to fighting games, you can use the simple mode to play like an experienced fighting game player just by repeatedly pressing buttons.

The trial version has arcade mode and survival mode for single player, and versus mode for battle.
